original_text: Elisha returned to Gilgal and there was a famine in that region. While the company of the prophets was meeting with him, he said to his servant, “Put on the large pot and cook some stew for these prophets.”
korean_text: 엘리사가 다시 길갈에 이르니 그 땅에 흉년이 들었는데 선지자의 제자들이 엘리사의 앞에 앉은지라 엘리사가 자기 사환에게 이르되 큰 솥을 걸고 선지자의 제자들을 위하여 국을 끓이라 하매

sentences.original_text: and there was a famine in that region
While the company of the prophets was meeting with him
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자들의 무리가 그와 함께 모여 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and cook some stew for these prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 선지자들을 위해 스튜를 만들어라
